release.action: Replaced sync mechanism by imports. They are configured in the properties file. Dump -upload option, replaced the sync options -download and -noDownload with -import and -noImport.
Renamed list command to ls. It prints an 'M' status if the checkout is not fully committed (and pushed for git projects) now, and it prints an 'X' status if the project is unknwon but in scm.

~/.pommes.properties to define query and format macros. Remove POMMES_LOCAL and POMMES_GLOBAL variables, this is defined by the properties file now. You can change the default location of this file with the new POMMES_PROPERTIES variable.
Added a M flag to the list command.
Improved action selection: return quits without actions now, a applies all actions.
Dumped fstab, all projects are mounted according to root/server/groupId/artifactId. You can configure the root directory in the properties files.
New query syntax: address fields with their id; alternatives, separated with blanks; lucene escape starts with '!' now. Added query and format macros.
Store urls in database.
Add support for github repositories.
Add support for git scm.
Dumped -svnuser and -svnpassword options. Specify credentials in the url instead. (I've removed them because I don't want special handling for Subversion repository authentication.)
find: merge duplicate lines.
Added goto choice parameter.

Database changes (CAUTION: you have to rebuild your's): updated from Lucene 4.9.1 to 6.0.0. Added revision, scm and urls field. Removed g, a, v, ga, dep-ga, dep-ga-ranges and par-ga fields, they were unused. Renamed dep-gav to dep, par-gav to parent, and gav to artifact.
Renamed =svn= variable to =scm=.
Merged database-export into find. Find now has an optional target argument (which also accepts files now) and -json and -dump options to print pretty-printed or raw json.
database-remove with arbitrary queries.

database-add: Added artifactory support - specify urls prefixed with 'artifactory:'. Added file support - specify file urls. Added json support - specify fil prefixed with 'json:'. Subversion urls have to be prefixed with 'svn:' now; -noBranches changed to %branches; also added %tags (default is false for both) Added -dryrun option.
Pommes goto no longer modifies your environment. To get the previous behavior, invoke pommes goto ... && . ~/.pommes.goto. Technically, pommes is a normal shell script now (not a shell function).
Internal change: update sushi 2.8.x to 3.0.0 and inline 1.0.0.
Added database export command.
Fix == in launcher script, has to be = instead.
Added dependencies to pom objects, you can search for them with "find :-substring". (The users command is just a shortcut for this)
Configurable output format for find. Also added dependencies to pom objects, so you can output them, too.
Query syntax: variables replaced context operator.
Improved setup: 'goto' is 'pommes goto'. To implement this, 'pommes' is a shell function now.
umount -stale no longer removes active json projects.
Support branches in database and query commands. The database schema has changed.
Mount commands reworked; added goto command.
Simple support for projects with composer.json files.
Added missing jakarta-regex dependency.
Unified update options for all database and search commands.
Moved to github. Changed groupId:artifactId to net.oneandone:pommes.
'create' command is called 'database-add' now, and it updates documents. To wipe the database, use the new 'database-clear' command.
Added 'database-clear' and 'database-remove' commands.
Added 'query' command so perform arbitrary lucene queries.
Renamed softreg to pommes. Adjust existing configuration files by renaming them accordingly.
Rename Index command to Create.
Added -local option to map search results (find and users) to local directories.
Updated Lucene 3.0.1 to 4.9.0.
Added 'find' command.
Dumped ypcache; persistent state is stored in Lucense instead.
Added 'users' command by merging usedby plugin. Includes default to major now.
Created softreg from ypwatcher, but dumpted svn- and yp import
